item.title: ELECTRONIC FLIGHT BAG (EFB) SYSTEM – NAVIGATION DATABASE – STC ST02053LA

remarks.para: May be out of date provided Merging and Spacing operations are prohibited.

numlitem.para: Verify discrepancy has been adequately documented in the logbook.

placard.para: Placard both EFB's "ADS-B CDTI NAV DATABASE IS OUT OF DATE" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
